body:
i did try to backport commit e6ec82067a9068c93db6e7041017060a1c863452 to 1.6 but it did not help. (or my conflict resolving was done bad). I am building `go1.7beta1` now.

In any case, i will need some kind of workaround since this made it to alpine linux 3.4-stable branch (due to success with `go1.6.1`)
